GET /organization/:org

https://http.cloud.tiny-mesh.com/v2/organization/:org
200 OK – A some resource
401 Unauthorized – A some resource
403 Forbidden – Authentication failed, or no access to the resource. some resource

Description

    Retrieves the some resource identified by nid.
